name: tabletopsimulator-lua
author: Rolando Romero <contact@rolandostar.com> (https://rolandostar.com/)
description: Extension for VSCode to make writing Lua scripts for Tabletop Simulator easier.

scripts.pretest: npm run lint && npm run compile

commands.title: Update autocomplete Intellisense to latest available TTS API

ttslua.fileManagement.autoOpen.description: Which files should VScode automatically open when receiving them from the game.
enumDescriptions: Open all received files when getting scripts.
Do not open any file. (Will still show files in explorer panel)

ttslua.fileManagement.createXML.title: Create XML UI file when object sent from Tabletop Simulator
ttslua.fileManagement.createXML.description: When an individual object is sent from Tabletop Simulator which has no XML UI, generate a blank XML file for it.

ttslua.fileManagement.includePaths.title: Additional paths to search for files
ttslua.fileManagement.includePaths.markdownDescription:
Both `~/Documents/Tabletop Simulator` and currently opened Folders in workspace are always included in search path.

eg. `C:\Users\<YourName>\MyTTSFiles\`

ttslua.fileManagement.luaSearchPattern.title: Pattern used to look for require'd files
ttslua.fileManagement.luaSearchPattern.markdownDescription:
`?.lua` is always searched for.

Described in Lua's [search path patterns](https://www.lua.org/pil/8.1.html).

ttslua.autocompletion.coroutineSuffix.title: Coroutine Suffix
ttslua.autocompletion.coroutineSuffix.description: When automatically creating an internal coroutine function this is appended to the parent function's name.

ttslua.autocompletion.guidSuffix.title: GUID Suffix
ttslua.autocompletion.guidSuffix.description: When guessing the getObjectFromGUID parameter this is appended to the name of the variable being assigned to.

ttslua.autocompletion.parameterFormat.description: How parameters will be formatted in autocomplete suggestions.  Use keywords TYPE and NAME to insert those parameter fields, with the desired casing (i.e. type vs Type vs TYPE).

ttslua.console.fontSize.title: Console++ Font Size
ttslua.console.fontSize.description: Font size for console panel in pixels. Can also be changed with Ctrl+Scroll.

ttslua.console.inputHeight.title: Console++ Input Height
ttslua.console.inputHeight.description: Height in pixels of the command input bar at the bottom.

ttslua.console.clearOnReload.title: Clear on Reload
ttslua.console.clearOnReload.description: Enable to clear Console++ history when opening new game or reloading.

ttslua.console.clearOnFocus.title: Reset to caret (>) on input focus
ttslua.console.clearOnFocus.markdownDescription: Enable to clear the command input bar when using ``double click`` or ``Enter`` to focus it.

ttslua.console.logSaves.description: Enable to log a message to the Console when a save occurs.

ttslua.misc.disableDirectoryWarning.markdownDescription: When enabled, the extension will not show a warning when directories are deteced in the In-Game Files. [Learn More](https://google.com)

ttslua.misc.debugSearchPaths.markdownDescription:
When enabled, the extension will output the paths and patterns it's using to locate includes and requires. Useful for debugging `ModuleResolution` errors.

Open the Developer Tools to see the output, default hotkey `Ctrl+Shift+I`.
